name: Super Mario on Scratch 3 - HTML Port
name_original: Super Mario on Scratch 3 - HTML Port
description:
This is Super Mario on Scratch 3 that is now ported to itch.io!

It may take a little while to load.

Here is the game running on Scratch https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/394187424/

Credits -

Nintendo for Mario, sounds/music

Me for the art.

Level design and ideas by triangle5820 on Scratch

Mario text style by Olivermario12 on Scratch

Scrolling engine by griffpatch on Scratch
